author: brett prentice
comment: App worked as intended, but when I woke up this morning, it told me the app couldn't log in. I purchased the full version, thinking it may solve my problem. It didn't. I've generated new app passwords, then disabled app passwords all together, nothing works. Can't find a way to contact any type of support team. Until this issue is fixed, I cannot recommend this app.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hello Brett, please use support@appfour.com for your support request. Also check about the "standalone" setting, depending if you have the companion app installed on your phone or not this should be disabled or enabled. Thank you.

author: AKIS A.
comment: It works very good. Only problem I cannot add iCloud email with my app specific password. All other email services worked (Hotmail Gmail)

author: gananath bhuyan
comment: This app doesn't work in my fossil smart watch. Team, Kindly solve the issues or refund the money I paid to buy this app.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please contact support@appfour.com for your request, we are happy to help.

author: Isma'il H.A. Ibn Thomas-Benge, III
comment: Simple. Effective. Just right

author: Kay Dee McCoy
comment: Overall I love the app, but there needs to be a way that you don't get a separate notification for every email. Somedays I'll end up with 150 separate notifications, that's way too much. If there was an option to eliminate individual notifications and just announced you have 150 emails, that way you could open the app itself to view them would be great. Uninstalling for now until such a feature is available.

author: Stickz
comment: The free version is legit - Can't ask for more!

author: Todd Lambert
comment: needs Exchange

author: Karen holland
comment: rubbish

I bought the full version had to reload watch and now it keeps asking for more money.  I have almost 30 in nothing that works . It charged me a second time and separate for this plugin.  And nothing works.  How do we get ahold of the company?

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi, this is a known Google issue and restarting your smartwatch should solve the problems. If you purchased the App Flat Rate/All Bundle: Please also make sure you have the app installed you did the purchase on before you restart the watch. For more information and help contact our support via support@appfour.com.

author: Alan Fidler
comment: In theory this app should be really good but in practice its unreliable. I have to keep opening the app on my Huawei W1 watch to get it to accept emails and display email notifications. Its useless if it isn't reliable. No response to my support request either. The app is a rip off.

author: Amy Chea
comment: I was getting frustrated with all the notifications I was getting on my watch, but after reading the app description, I found out how to turn it off after purchasing the full version. Great app!

author: Tara Bertolini
comment: Never got past trying to add my Yahoo mail account which it says it supports!  Deleted the app as I was already receiving my other emails.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: We are working on this issue. Sorry for the inconvenience.

author: Dave J
comment: Great! A solution for my Ticwatch E that refused to vibrate when am email arrived. Happy to pay for this.. Saved the day

author: William grismer
comment: Good app but why cant I add an exchange email account? Also, there needs to be away to not get the junk email. I only want to see primary. I might switch.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: You can set it to primary email only in the settings. Problems with Exchange will get looked into.

author: Vinnie Tran
comment: The app is functional albeit a bit bare bones. The amount of notifications asking to upgrade to premium however seem quite excessive.

author: Victoria Eggbeer
comment: I have paid for the full version but cant get past putting my login details into my watch...any idea how to sort this??

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Victoria, please contact our support team for help. (support@appfour.com)

author: David Pye
comment: Great app hope you guys expand it so it works with exchange servers with locked ports
the app on the phone wouldn't work

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi, if you need help with the app please send an email to support@appfour.com.

author: Maria Vega
comment: Unable to log into yahoo.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Sorry for the inconvenience, we will look into these problems.

comment: Does not work with Yahoo Mail. Intermittent on Outlook at best

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: We will look into these issues, please check out future versions for improvements and bugfixes.

author: Chanel B
comment: wish I knew I had to pay for this before I downloaded it

reply.author: appfour
reply.content:
Hi,
we do not exactly understand what you are saying. If you need help with the app please contact support@appfour.com.

author: Long Tan
comment: This app doesn't support Yahoo mail

author: Lynette Shaw McKone
comment: It's ok: nothing to write home about,  it's just an Email app.

author: PikoMeter
comment: Nice app! MUST HAVE FOR TICWATCH! Thanks for the app

author: Michael Olivarez
comment: Great app...I can now get my notifications from one of my multiple email accounts on my watch.

author: BOU Vuthy
comment: Good app for andriod wear
Ok

author: Geoff Warren
comment: Good

author: Kevin Sharpe
comment: Awesome

author: Rb S
comment: Please add an update to let us turn off notifications for spam mail that falls into the promotion or social categories of gmail.  The notifications go off constantly.  I only care about primary mail.

author: Andy McLean
comment: Good App (Paid version on Moto 360 G2) but wish I could turn off notifications for spam mails. The Gmail app on my phone hides notifications for promotion and social mails but they buzz constantly on my watch.
Notifications don't come in on occasion, asked nicely for a refund, and would not refund. Sketch freemium model, etc. Just a heads up.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback. I send a reply via email as well. Everything should be fine now. :)

author: Martinez Green
comment: Useful app

author: Dylan Moore
comment: Great

author: Tim Lawless
comment: Iike it

author: public public
comment: Was using this app full version , no problem.  With last update and after reinstalling,  app does not seem to fetch new emails from hotmail (shows no email ) Something is wrong with latest version

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi, please try using the new "swipe down to refresh" option and if this does not solve your issue contact support@appfour.com. We would like to look into this bug.

author: joeyhast
comment: After I figured out phone app must be ran to receive watch notifications without doubling, great app!

author: Victoria B
comment: it will not add my email address is continually telling me my ID and password is incorrect I wish I can add no stars at all

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please get help via support@appfour.com. We are very sorry for the inconvenience and would like to learn more about your issue. Thank you.

author: Andrew Zhuang Enlie
comment: Great App, for a start.. cause I'm just beginning to use it

author: E B
comment: Super handy email access right on the watch!
